body_html: Yes, it will build on TX1 too. I fixed a problem with the new memory allocator to take in account the 32bit OS. Some basic tests are passing but the label_image test is giving the wrong results so there may be some other places with 32bit issues.
body_text: Yes, it will build on TX1 too. I fixed a problem with the new memory allocator to take in account the 32bit OS. Some basic tests are passing but the label_image test is giving the wrong results so there may be some other places with 32bit issues.
body: Yes, it will build on TX1 too. I fixed a problem with the new memory allocator to take in account the 32bit OS. Some basic tests are passing but the label_image test is giving the wrong results so there may be some other places with 32bit issues.
